title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the model layer for data, the view layer for design, and the controller layer for application for logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentification and authorization. Authentificationn means confirminf your own identity, whereass authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have loved learning about ORM's. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL.
